author: petervg
title: Factpage: Cardano fact check site
description: Fake news and disinformation about Cardano is given strength when facts cannot be independently audited and separated from falsehoods.
solution: Archive media about Cardano using the verifiable audit trails implemented in the Orcfax oracle project and publish an explorer at fact.page
experience: Orcfax development team implementing trustworthy, decentralized "proofs-of-fact" using W3C specs, IPFS, DAGs and Cardano notarization.
